item.description:
Yes, we're having our first real snowfall of the season and our brunch is still on as of Sun Dec 7th at 9:30 AM.

You're welcome to join us even without an RSVP, just call or text me 617 445-7579 to be included.
Come out for a relaxing meal with your fellow friendly foodies. Safe travels.

What a lovely wintry morning... here is a cool poem which seems apropos:

HOLIDAY SNOWFALL

they're falling
drifting down
big beautiful snowflakes
covering the ground

they're evoking gleeful feelings
nods to holiday expectations
those of generous intention
filled with heartfelt expressions

they're proclaiming seasonal greetings
times of reverence and thankfulness
days enjoyed with family and friends
times of love and happiness

they're falling
sacred offerings of pristine white
big beautiful snowflakes
covering everything within sight

Copyright Â© 2008 by Gwen Dickerson
All rights reserved.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


Fellow foodie, Nicole suggested having brunch here.
Since she mentioned it, I've heard nothing but good reviews.

Since this is an intimate group, you will not be allowed to invite guests.
Your guest is welcome to join our group, here http://www.meetup.com... , so they can RSVP for themselves.

Check out http://www.westoncent... for the menu, directions, and parking details.

These MEMBER GUIDELINES were developed so our events run smoothly.

Please be considerate of your fellow diners time by arriving promptly so we can be seated together.

Please bring enough cash to pay for your meal, drinks, tip, and tax.

All RSVP's are on a first come, first served basis.

You may only RSVP YES or NO. Maybe isn't an option.

Please RSVP YES only if you are certain you will attend.

If you're not sure you can attend because you have other unconfirmed plans or uncertain transportation, please RSVP NO with comment about your circumstances.

If brunch is full and you wish to attend, please select WAIT LIST RSVP. *If there is an overwhelming response, the reservation may be increased or another seating arranged.*

If your name appears on the event page as a YES after the event and you have not attended the event, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.

If I must change your RSVP to NO because you haven't replied to final update event confirmation email deadline, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.

If you change your RSVP from a YES to a NO within twenty-four hours of the event, without an explanation, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.

If you are a NO-SHOW for three events you are removed from the group.

NO-SHOWS impact everyone; from you, who could or has been on the wait list to the organizer as well as the restaurant's which are staffed based on our reservation.

If it is less than twenty-fours from the meal and you are not able to attend or are running late, you must text or call me on my cell (617) 445-7549

An email from you to me, Tonya explaining your absence is an expected courtesy.

If you are removed and there were extenuating circumstances, please email me about rejoining.

Your feedback is appreciated, so please, rate the event and venue by completing the post event survey.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Tonya/Meetup reservation or call/text my cell (617) 445 7549

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Brunch at West on Centre - It May Be Snowing But We're Still Going
